scripts.generate:csharp: mkdir -p tmp_gen || true && npx quicktype --lang cs --namespace VictoryCommand.Schema --src docs/specs/game_spec.full.schema.json -o tmp_gen/GameModels.Generated.cs && node postprocess-cs.js tmp_gen/GameModels.Generated.cs ../../Assets/Scripts/Generated/GameModels.Generated.cs
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:ts && npm run generate:csharp
